title: Pipeline Runtime Trend
description: Day-wise pipeline runtime trend showing max, min, and average runtime

maxRuntime.description: Maximum runtime in milliseconds among all pipelines executed on this date

minRuntime.description: Minimum runtime in milliseconds among all pipelines executed on this date

avgRuntime.description: Average runtime in milliseconds for pipelines executed on this date

totalPipelines.description: Total number of pipelines executed on this date
